pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Alberta Premier Jason Kenney | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Alberta Premier Jason Kenney to discuss the spring flooding situation in northern Alberta and their deep concern for everyone affected.

Premier Kenney provided an update on the situation, and provincial efforts to address it. 

The Prime Minister indicated that the Government of Canada is closely following the situation, and stands ready to provide any federal assistance that is requested. The Prime Minister also assured Premier Kenney that the Government of Canada can assist Alberta with recovery and clean-up efforts.
